item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 15, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:

10. Did Semgrep Just Get a Lot More Interesting? (87 points | 30 comments)
11. The largest sofa you can move around a corner (147 points | 68 comments)

13. Complex dynamics require complex solutions (167 points | 105 comments)
14. Show HN: Letting LLMs Run a Debugger (19 points | 8 comments)
15. The Iconic 3DBenchy Enters the Public Domain (141 points | 8 comments)

21. A study on how turtles navigate using the Earth’s magnetic field (152 points | 57 comments)
22. If you believe in "Artificial Intelligence", take five minutes to ask it (87 points | 107 comments)
23. Show HN: Transform your codebase into a single Markdown doc for feeding into AI (237 points | 151 comments)
24. Recurring checklists using Org Mode in Emacs (20 points | 2 comments)
25. Elements of Programming (2009) (123 points | 8 comments)
26. Goku Flow Based Video Generative Foundation Models (7 points | 2 comments)
27. Intensional Joy (a concatenative account of internal structure) (47 points | 8 comments)
28. Detecting AI agent use and abuse (138 points | 75 comments)
29. Anyone can push updates to the doge.gov website (1011 points | 892 comments)
30. Kevin Mitnik FOIA Final (172 points | 87 comments)
